Q46313.title: In Budapest, a medieval synagogue dormant for hundreds of years is rededicated
Q46313.description:
BUDAPEST -- In front of hundreds of onlookers and Hungarian President Janos Ader, a ceremony on Thursday evening marked the revival of an ancient synagogue that has lain dormant for hundreds of years.

Built in 1364, the Medieval Jewish Prayer House, a small, two-room Sephardic synagogue in the Buda Castle -- a UNESCO World Heritage Site -- was taken from the Jews after a devastating pogrom in 1686 when a coalition of Christian armies recaptured the city of Buda from the Ottoman Turks.

The synag

Q23308.title: Armenia refuses to return bodies of Azerbaijani soldiers
Q23308.description:
Azerbaijan's Defense Ministry announced on Monday that the bodies of five Azerbaijani soldiers, who were killed in clashes on February 24, have not been returned due to new Armenian demands.

The demands came despite a previous deal between the two countries, which was reached with the help of international institutions.

The OSCE and International Red Crescent officials from the conflict area planned to retrieve the bodies of the five soldiers, who died trying to prevent a provocation by the Arm

Q2981.title: University of Notre Dame donates $100K to renovation of Paris
Q2981.description:
SOUTH BEND, Ind. (WTHR/AP) -- The University of Notre Dame will donate $100,000 toward the renovation of the Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris, which was destroyed by a massive fire on Monday.

We are deeply saddened to see the damage to the Cathedral of Notre-Dame in Paris, a church whose exquisite Gothic architecture has for centuries raised hearts and minds to God. We join in prayer with the faithful of the cathedral and all of France as they begin the work of rebuilding. We are reminded of the w

Q747541.title: Italian police search homes connected to Berlin attack suspect
Q747541.description:
Italian police search homes connected to Berlin attack suspect

By Reuters

Published: 14:38 GMT, 29 December 2016 | Updated: 14:38 GMT, 29 December 2016

e-mail

ROME, Dec 29 (Reuters) - Italian police have searched three houses in and around Rome, where the man suspected of killing 12 people last week at a Christmas market in Berlin may have spent time, a judicial source said on Thursday.

Anis Amri, a Tunisian, first arrived in Europe by boat to the Italian island of Lampedusa in 2011, and was

Q550.title: Police vehicle rammed on Champs-Elysees in possible terrorist attack
Q550.description:
PARIS -- A car exploded as it crashed into a police vehicle on Paris's famed Champs Élysées on Monday in what authorities called a possible terrorist attack. Only the driver was injured, Paris police sources said.

Police are treating the incident as a deliberate attack, and the Paris prosecutor had opened an anti-terror investigation as of late Monday afternoon.

In late April, before the first round of voting in France's presidential elections, there was a similar incident on the Champs Elys

Q243.title: Regina mechanic-model headed to Paris for fashion show in Eiffel Tower
Q243.description:
Indigenous designers haven't really had that big of a platform to be able to showcase their talent and their art... It's definitely a really big deal.

During the day, 21-year-old Olivia Saulteaux is an apprentice, training to become an auto technician.

At night, she's making quick strides in the fashion world.

With just two shows under her belt, Saulteaux was chosen from a group of more than 50 models to go to Paris to be in a fashion show in the Eiffel Tower.

It's still pretty unbelievabl
